00007 #include "SGP_Constants.h"
00008 
00009 #include <string.h>
00010 
00011 void getMaterialName(long* material_no, char* material_name){
00012         switch( (int)(*material_no) ){
00013                 case Water_Liquid:
00014                         strcpy(material_name,"Water, Liquid");
00015                         break;
00016                 case Aluminum_Oxide:
00017                         strcpy(material_name,"Aluminum Oxide");
00018                         break;
00019                 case Aluminum:
00020                         strcpy(material_name,"Aluminum");
00021                         break;
00022                 case PMMA:
00023                         strcpy(material_name,"PMMA");
00024                         break;
00025                 default:
00026                         strcpy(material_name,"");
00027                         break;
00028                 }
00029 }
00030 
00031 void getMaterialNo(char* material_name, long* material_no){
00032         *material_no    = -1;
00033         if( strcmp(material_name,"Water, Liquid") == 0)
00034                 *material_no = Water_Liquid;
00035         if( strcmp(material_name,"Aluminum Oxide") == 0)
00036                 *material_no = Aluminum_Oxide;
00037         if( strcmp(material_name,"Aluminum") == 0)
00038                 *material_no = Aluminum;
00039         if( strcmp(material_name,"PMMA") == 0)
00040                 *material_no = PMMA;
00041 }
